name: Spacer Shipper Shooter 2.0
description:
Just a shoot-em-up game, a very difficult one though :)

Controls
keyboard
Arrow keys - move
Z - shoot
A + arrow keys - dash

gamepad
D-pad - move
A - shoot
X + D-pad - dash

If the game is too difficult, you may go to the option menu and turn on the easy mode, I know that the game is hard sooooo, it is here. Good luck and have fun !!!
